question: In which of the following sessions of Indian National Congress , our national anthem was first sung 27 December 1911 ?
explanation: The National Anthem "Janaganamana" was first publicly sung on 27 December 1911 during the Calcutta Session of the Indian National Congress. Bishan Narayan Dar was the president of the session. The National Anthem was adopted on 24 January 1950.
